description: Five young, skilled surfers were overcome by freak foam conditions in Scheveningen.
title: Surfing tragedy that stunned a Dutch beach community
title_page: Surfing tragedy that stunned a Dutch beach community - BBC News
maintext: "The grief in the Scheveningen community is unimaginable," said Johan Remkes, acting mayor of The Hague. "People here understand better than anyone else that the sea gives and the sea takes away, but the way so many young lives are now being broken down and so many families and groups of friends have been affected is uniquely cruel."
